revised_title: Strong Slot Injection into a Supersonic Laminar Boundary Layer
tldr: The authors study strong slot injection into a supersonic laminar boundary layer, focusing on the pressure buildup ahead of the slot and the fluid's readjustment downstream. They use the triple-deck theory to analyze the interaction region and provide insights into the flow structure when the blowing velocity is high. This research helps in understanding the effects of strong slot injection and can be applied to plate injection as well.
